servinfo.title: Water Pump Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine Model)

s1.ptxt: Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining .
Remove water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine) .
Remove thermostat referring to Thermostat Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine Model) .
Disconnect heater pipe (2) from water pump (1).
Remove water pump (1) from cylinder block (3).

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Install water pump assembly to cylinder block and tighten bolts to specified torque.
Refill cooling system referring to Step 7) to 17) of Cooling System Flush and Refill .
Verify that there is no coolant leakage at each connection.
